thread.title: North Charleston City 5
thread.title_full: Candidates for North Charleston City Council, District 5 - Post and Courier

author: postandcourier.com
title: North Charleston City 5
text:
Sean Middleton Stephen Ayer Did not respond
Sean Middleton Age: 32
Residence: North Point
Occupation: Owner of SM Logistics
Education: University of South Carolina, B.S., Journalism & Mass Communications
 (843) 209-6691, haybuyerandseller@yahoo.com
 Standing up for social justice and equality in North Charleston.
 I understand the failures of Mayor Summey and City Council to improve North Charleston. Our city has low income, poverty, unemployment, and poor access to education. I can fix this.
 District 5 is dominated by minorities and lower income individuals and is ignored by this city. I will end this and bring quality education, good paying jobs, and livable wages.
Todd Olds Age: 45
Residence: Plantation Isle
Occupation: Owner, Prime Properties of Charleston
Education: College of Charleston, Bachelor of Arts, Political Science/Business
Political experience: North Charleston City Council, 2011-present
Contact information: (843) 200-1813, oldstodd@gmail.com , toddoldscitycouncil@gmail.com , www.toddolds.com
 With my wife, Connie, my childrenâ€™s sports, grandchildren, fishing, hunting, watching SEC football
 Always available, experience, incumbent councilman, former planning commissioner, 23 year successful business owner, provides me vast knowledge/experience to represent the citizens and businesses in a responsible fiscal manner. Committed To Community.
 Committed To Community. Fiscal responsibility to taxpayers, sustainable quality growth, quality zoning, jobs, traffic and continue to serve the needs of District 5 citizens and business.
